preface.title: Welcome to the BLFS Editor's Manual
preface.para: This document is designed to be a friendly introduction to BLFS editing. We've put it together in order to prevent a single "point of failure/delay" (so to speak) in the BLFS Project.

This document covers a few things. Firstly, basic admin issues like accessing Subversion over SSH, committing changes and BLFS logging policy. Then we briefly discuss a little bit of general BLFS policy.
We hope this little document will be helpful not only to all of the (co)editors but also to all people thinking about contributing to BLFS.
